title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4114.1 - Program cancellation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4114.1 - Program cancellation

State Regulations

No racing program or any part of a racing program may be
cancelled without the consent of the track steward. In the event any heat or
race of a program is cancelled for any reason, the remainder of such program
may be cancelled by the track steward, if in the track steward's judgment such
action is warranted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4114.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
